sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react" import "./Weather.css" import axios from 'axios;' export default function Weather() { const[ready, setReady] =useState(false); const[temperature, setTemperature] = useState(null); function handleResponse(response) { console.log(`The weather in New York is ${response.data.main.temp}°C`) setTemperature(response.data.main.temp); setReady(true); } if (ready) { return (

New York

  • Monday 06:00
  • Mostly Cloudy
{temperature} °C
  • Precipitation: 15%
  • Humidity: 87%
  • Wind: 16km/h%
) } else { let apikey = "5f472b7acba333cd8a035ea85a0d4d4c" let city = "New York" let apiUrl = `http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${apikey}&units=metric` axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse) return "loading..." } };
